title: 2024 Road Map
desc: See the list of perpetual task for day to day expansion

points.point: On-chain GATA DAO - Establishing on-chain GATA DAO using DAO DAO
Community rewards via Streampay - Using existing tooling to reward active community
Alternate Validator Funding model and validator expansion
GATA Channels Overhauling - New GATA web, restructuring of X and docs
Launch of Yield Paws on Stragaze launchpad
Yield gorilla's vote for new Yield strategies
GATA Namada SE-100 and Elys testnet
Expansion of GATA infra & public goods support
GATA Rollapp on dymension testnet - Phase 1 of dapps (NFT minting and staking yield dapp)
GATA loyalty app (for the community participation rewards)
GATA ICF Foundation application
Launch of GATA HUB TV on Omniflix
GATA at Flixfest and Cosmoverse
Launch of yGATA token via streamswap and establishing GATA Yield DAO
Launch of Yield Crocs YC - New yield collection in yGATA
Launch of GATA Rollapp on dymension mainnet
Launch of GATA Rollapp Airdrop
Feils Update; a comprehensive update to improve the GATA revenue model through a governance proposal.
Launch of Souvenir Series to make important events even more memorable.
Launch of GATA x FLIX launch souvenir and airdropped to GATA and YG holders ~1800 Unique addresses. Read more about the collection here
Joined Omniflix network as validator
GATA infra for IBC relayer and public goods
Joined Akash network as validator and public goods.
Launch of AIG; Apes in games (The complete launch postponed after delays from the launchpad).
Archway genesis validator.
Started validator services on passage
Launch of GATA Delegators Award NFT; airdropped to 5.2K unique delegators of GATA validators.
started validator services on stargaze.
Launch of GATA GAZE 7
Free mint of GATA Christmas collection 2023 to all the stakeholders ( ~5500 Unique addresses) launched on Stargaze network.
Creation of the GATA community on Twitter and Discord
Giveaways for the community to bootstrap the marketing
Minting Website
Genesis Mint of DAO’s First Collection Colonial Cats (950 GATAc)
Distribution of giveaways and honorary NFT (49 GATAc)
Verification and integration of all GATA Owner
DAO vote to select the chains where GATA DAO will operate as a validator
DAO’s website, DAO’s own voting module and Reward distribution module.
Launch of next NFT collections on different platforms across Cosmos to onboard new users and more liquidity to expand the operations.
Participation in incentivized Test-nets of new sovereign blockchains.
Strengthening the DAO Treasury.
Exploring new streams of revenue.
